section.heading: Members of the Health Literacy Council.
section.text: The Health Literacy Council shall be composed of 15 members, as follows:

para.text: One member shall be appointed by the Chairperson of the Council committee with oversight over the Department of Health;
One member shall be the President of the University of the District of Columbia, or the President's designee;
One member shall be the President of the Community College of the District of Columbia, or the President's designee;
One member shall be the Executive Director of the Health Benefit Exchange Authority, or the Executive Director's designee;
One member shall be the Director of the Department of Behavioral Health, or the Director's designee;
One member shall be the Director of the Department of Health Care Finance, or the Director's designee;
One member shall be the Director of the Department of Health, or the Director's designee; and
Eight members shall be appointed by the Mayor, as follows:
One member shall represent the Workforce Investment Council;
Four members shall be District residents with extensive knowledge of health resources and services, health education, and the field of health literacy programs;
One member shall represent the Youth Advisory Council;
One faculty member from a District of Columbia university who is a District resident with specific experience in issues of equity in health care systems; and
One member with experience in primary care who is employed by a clinic or an association representing clinics.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-66: § 7 of D.C. Law 22-66 provided that the creation of this section by § 4 of D.C. Law 22-66 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-66: § 7 of D.C. Law 22-66 provided that the creation of this section by § 4 of D.C. Law 22-66 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7023 of D.C. Law 22-168 repealed section 7 of D.C. Law 22-66 amending the applicability restriction impacting this section. Therefore the creation of this section by D.C. Law 22-66 has been implemented.

Section 7023 of D.C. Law 22-168 repealed section 7 of D.C. Law 22-66 amending the applicability restriction impacting this section. Therefore the creation of this section by D.C. Law 22-66 has been implemented.
